RESUME_TIPS: Emphasize experience with **Large Language Models (LLMs)** by detailing specific projects or tasks where you utilized them. Describe the models you have worked with and the outcomes achieved to showcase your practical skills.

Highlight your proficiency in **PyTorch** by including specific projects where you used it for model development or optimization. Focus on its internals like autograd and efficient dataloaders to demonstrate in-depth knowledge.

Add a section detailing your experience with **Fine tuning** LLMs, mentioning the datasets used, models fine-tuned (e.g., LLaMA, Falcon), and performance improvements achieved to prove your hands-on skills.

Include details about your familiarity with **Quantization** techniques such as GPTQ, AWQ, and QLoRA. Provide examples of how you have used these techniques to improve model efficiency and deployment readiness.

Create an **Active Hugging Face profile** and mention it in your resume, including any models or repositories you have published. Actively engaging in the Hugging Face community can significantly enhance your profile.

Incorporate experience with **Transformers** library from Hugging Face, detailing how you used it for various NLP tasks. Focus on how you leveraged the library to solve specific problems and improve model performance.

Explain your experience with **RAG (Retrieval Augmented Generation)** pipelines, including how you evaluated and extended these pipelines to improve reasoning agents. Highlight any contributions to SOTA model architectures.

Document your **Benchmarking** skills by mentioning standardized evaluations you have run (e.g., MMLU, GSM8K) and how you interpreted the metrics. Show that you are capable of accurately measuring and improving model performance.

Add projects that involve **Multi-modal models**, such as vision language/audio models. This will significantly enhance your profile and demonstrate your versatility in handling different types of data and model architectures.

Update your resume with specific projects or experiences related to **Deep Learning**, emphasizing your involvement in optimizing models and bringing ideas from paper to production. Showcase your ability to translate theoretical knowledge into practical solutions.

Large Language Models (LLMs).COURSE_NAME: Large Language Models: Application through Production
Large Language Models (LLMs).DESCRIPTION: This course explores the application of Large Language Models (LLMs) from initial design to production deployment. It covers fine-tuning, prompt engineering, and deployment strategies, providing hands-on experience with LLMs.

Large Language Models (LLMs).COURSE_NAME: Building Generative AI Applications with Google Cloud
Large Language Models (LLMs).DESCRIPTION: Learn how to build generative AI applications using Google Cloud's generative AI tools and models. Learn how to perform prompt engineering, and fine-tune large language models for particular tasks.

Large Language Models (LLMs).COURSE_NAME: How to build and train your own Large Language Model (LLM)
Large Language Models (LLMs).DESCRIPTION: Step by step guide to building and training your own Large Language Model (LLM).

PyTorch.COURSE_NAME: PyTorch for Deep Learning with Python Bootcamp
PyTorch.DESCRIPTION: Learn how to use PyTorch, the popular Deep Learning framework, to create Artificial Neural Networks for Computer Vision and Natural Language Processing

This course is part of the AI Product Management Specialization. You will learn how to build PyTorch models for real-world applications. This course covers key concepts such as PyTorch tensors and automatic differentiation.

PyTorch.COURSE_NAME: PyTorch Full Course for Beginners | Deep Learning with Python
PyTorch.DESCRIPTION: This course teaches you Deep Learning with Python, covering topics from basic PyTorch tensors to neural networks.

Fine tuning.DESCRIPTION: Learn how to fine-tune open-source large language models (LLMs).
Learn how to fine-tune a Transformers model on a text classification task.

Fine tuning.COURSE_NAME: How to Fine-Tune Large Language Models (LLMs)
Fine tuning.DESCRIPTION: Learn how to fine-tune pre-trained large language models (LLMs) for better performance

Quantization.DESCRIPTION: This specialization focuses on quantization techniques for deep learning models. It covers the basics of quantization, various methods, and implementation details to optimize models for deployment.

Quantization.COURSE_NAME: Quantization and Training of Neural Networks
Quantization.DESCRIPTION: This course dives into the methods and mathematics behind quantization and training of neural networks. Explore the quantization and training techniques that can be used on a multitude of applications from embedded systems and micro-controllers, to the data center. Topics covered include: fixed point representation, quantization techniques and deployment, binarized neural networks, and training methods to retain accuracy.

Quantization.COURSE_NAME: Quantization in Neural Networks â€” Deep Learning Course
Quantization.DESCRIPTION: Learn about quantization of neural networks and why it's important in deep learning. This tutorial explores the basics and methods of quantization to optimize models.

Hugging Face.COURSE_NAME: Hugging Face Ecosystem - Models, Datasets and Hub
Hugging Face.DESCRIPTION: This course covers the core concepts and tools within the Hugging Face ecosystem, including Transformers, Datasets, and the Hub, to help you effectively use pre-trained models and datasets.
This Specialization brings you state-of-the-art Natural Language Processing (NLP) models from the Hugging Face Transformers library

Hugging Face.COURSE_NAME: Hugging Face tutorial - getting started with BERT and transformers
Hugging Face.DESCRIPTION: This beginner-friendly tutorial introduces you to BERT and Hugging Face Transformers, demonstrating how to use them for NLP tasks.

Transformers.DESCRIPTION: Explore the architecture and applications of transformer networks, including attention mechanisms, encoder-decoder structures, and their role in NLP tasks. This course covers the theory and implementation of transformers.
Gain expertise in using transformers for various NLP tasks, covering models like BERT, GPT, and RoBERTa. Learn how to fine-tune and apply these models to solve real-world problems in NLP.

Transformers.COURSE_NAME: Transformers Explained: A Step-by-Step Visual Walkthrough
Transformers.DESCRIPTION: A comprehensive visual explanation of how transformers work, breaking down the key components and mechanisms step by step.

RAG (Retrieval Augmented Generation).DESCRIPTION: This course is designed for intermediate level AI/ML practitioners who wants to master the fundamental concepts, latest techniques, and best practices of RAG with LlamaIndex.

RAG (Retrieval Augmented Generation).COURSE_NAME: Full GenAI course for FREE: Retrieval Augmented Generation
RAG (Retrieval Augmented Generation).DESCRIPTION: This free course for Retrieval Augmented Generation is an end-to-end free course in Retrieval Augmented Generation, including vector databases, LLMs and LangChain/LlamaIndex.

RAG (Retrieval Augmented Generation).COURSE_NAME: LangChain: Chat with Your Data (RAG) | FREE Course
RAG (Retrieval Augmented Generation).DESCRIPTION: LangChain: Chat with Your Data (RAG) | FREE Course

Benchmarking.DESCRIPTION: Learn to evaluate the performance of machine learning models using various metrics and techniques. Understand how to select the best model for a given task through rigorous benchmarking.

Benchmarking.COURSE_NAME: Measuring and Evaluating Machine Learning Models
Benchmarking.DESCRIPTION: This course teaches you how to measure and evaluate machine learning models to build better algorithms. Learn to evaluate classifiers, evaluate rankers, evaluate regression models, evaluate clusterers, choose which evaluation metrics to use, learn about A/B testing, learn about statistical hypothesis testing, and learn about online evaluation.

Benchmarking.COURSE_NAME: Model Evaluation, Model Selection, and Algorithm Selection
Benchmarking.DESCRIPTION: This video describes several techniques to evaluate the model

GPTQ.COURSE_NAME: Advanced Quantization Techniques for Deep Learning
GPTQ.DESCRIPTION: An in-depth course on advanced quantization techniques, including GPTQ, to optimize and compress deep learning models for deployment on resource-constrained devices.
This video provides a brief introduction on deep learning quantization.

GPTQ.COURSE_NAME: GPTQ: ACCURATE POST-TRAINING QUANTIZATION FOR GENERATIVE TRANSFORMERS
GPTQ.DESCRIPTION: A guide through the most recent paper GPTQ: Accurate Post-Training Quantization for Generative Transformers

AWQ.COURSE_NAME: Advanced Quantization Techniques for Deep Learning
AWQ.DESCRIPTION: An in-depth course on advanced quantization techniques, including Activation-Aware Weight Quantization (AWQ) to optimize and compress deep learning models for deployment on resource-constrained devices.

AWQ.COURSE_NAME: Activation-Aware Weight Quantization for Neural Network Compression and Acceleration
AWQ.DESCRIPTION: This course provides a detailed look into Activation-Aware Weight Quantization.
Paper reading on how it works and why it's useful to implement.

QLoRA.COURSE_NAME: Fine-Tuning Large Language Models with QLoRA
QLoRA.DESCRIPTION: Explore QLoRA (Quantization-Aware Low-Rank Adaptation) for efficient fine-tuning of large language models. Learn to adapt pre-trained models with minimal computational resources and maintain performance.

QLoRA.COURSE_NAME: QLoRA: Efficient Finetuning of Quantized LLMs
QLoRA.DESCRIPTION: QLoRA: Efficient Finetuning of Quantized LLMs

QLoRA.COURSE_NAME: Fine-Tuning LLMs with LoRA and QLoRA: Implementing PEFT with PyTorch and Hugging Face
QLoRA.DESCRIPTION: Fine-Tuning LLMs with LoRA and QLoRA: Implementing PEFT with PyTorch and Hugging Face

bitsandbytes.DESCRIPTION: This course guides you on how to implement bitsandbytes for better performance

bitsandbytes.COURSE_NAME: 8-bit Matrix Multiplication via Online Quantization for Resource-Constrained Deep Learning
bitsandbytes.DESCRIPTION: This video shows how to implement 8-bit Matrix Multiplication via Online Quantization for Resource-Constrained Deep Learning.

mixed precision.DESCRIPTION: This guide explains how to use mixed precision to speed up training and reduce memory usage. It covers best practices and examples for TensorFlow and PyTorch.
Learn how to implement mixed precision training with PyTorch Lightning. This tutorial covers automatic mixed precision (AMP) and best practices for optimizing performance.
A practical guide on implementing mixed precision training in PyTorch to improve training speed and reduce memory footprint.

memory profiling.DESCRIPTION: Learn about memory management techniques in Python to optimize code performance. This course covers garbage collection, memory profiling, and best practices for reducing memory usage.
Learn how to implement memory profiling to better understand performance.

multi modal models.DESCRIPTION: A good course to implement ML with Python. Learn how to build models that process and integrate multiple data modalities.

multi modal models.COURSE_NAME: Zero-shot Multilingual Machine Translation with Multimodal Guidance
multi modal models.DESCRIPTION: A course on multi modal ML with guidance on how to approach it.
